# Import Code
```text

```

# Installation
In Streamer.bot in select the hambuger â˜° menu in the top left and select`Import`.

![launchtts-import-open.png](/assets/launch-tts/launchtts-import-open.png)

![launchtts-import-blank.png](/assets/launch-tts/launchtts-import-blank.png)

Copy the `Import Code` (at top of this page) and paste it into the `Import String` box.

![launchtts-import.png](/assets/launch-tts/launchtts-import.png)

# Configuration
In the `Action` you can see the comments read:
"Set the full path, including the exe to TwitchSpeaker in the argument below"

Open a Window Browser and navigate to where twitchSpeaker is installed. Once there click in the top location bar and copy the path and the double-click the "Set argument" sub-action highlighted below

![launchtts-edit.png](/assets/launch-tts/launchtts-edit.png)

Next, paste the location of TwitchSpeaker that you just copied into the Value filed. Be sure to add `\twitchspeaker.exe` to the end. It should end up being something like:

`C:\Streaming\Apps\TwitchSpeaker\twitchspeaker.exe`

![launchtts-edit-setting.png](/assets/launch-tts/launchtts-edit-setting.png)

# Tips
This is very handy when being used with the [sb-init](/en/extensions/sb-init) extension by [Krayn_](https://www.twitch.tv/Krayn_) that auto runs actions when launching Streamer.bot
